get.summary: Retrieve all workspaces

parameters.name: includeCurrent
parameters.description: Use 'true' to include the currently authenticated workspace in the response. By default, only secondary workspaces are returned.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Use 'active' to return only active workspace. Use 'disabled' to return only disabled workspace. By default, all workspaces are returned.

code-samples.code:
import requests

url = "https://app.vwo.com/api/v2/accounts?includeCurrent=false&status=all"

headers = {
    'token': "96ca71826128162811321nnjadsdjnsadkf33c4c03660a2398abd93f60c74ef1b442a434",
    'cache-control': "no-cache"
    }

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

get.summary: Retrieve specific workspace

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Use 'current' keyword to refer to the Main Workspace or the Integer Workspace Id

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Use 'current' keyword to refer to the Main Account or the Integer Sub Account Id

timezone.description: Timezone associated with the Workspace e.g. \"Asia\/Kolkata\"

name.description: Company name associated with the Workspace

website.description: Website URL of the Company, if any

get.summary: Retrieve timeline feeds of a workspace

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of feeds to be returned. Maximum allowed value is 100. If value greater than 100 is passed, default value will be used.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Use 'current' keyword to refer to the Main workspace or the Integer Workspace Id

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset where feeds should be fetched from

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: UTC timestamp in epoch seconds for filtering the feeds (e.g. 1609459200 for 1st January 2021)

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: UTC timestamp in epoch seconds for filtering the feeds (e.g. 1609545600 for 1st February 2021)

code-samples.code:
import requests

url = "https://app.vwo.com/api/v2/accounts/current/feeds?limit=25&offset=0&startTime=1609459200&endTime=1609545600"

headers = {
    'token': "96ca71826128162811321nnjadsdjnsadkf33c4c03660a2398abd93f60c74ef1b442a434",
    'cache-control': "no-cache"
    }

response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

get.summary: Get all campaigns in a workspace

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Use 'current' keyword to refer to the Main Workspace or the Integer Workspace Id

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of campaigns to be returned

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset where campaign should be fetched from

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Get campaigns on the basis of campaign-type

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Get campaigns for a particular platform.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of labels to filter out campaigns

parameters.name: showDetailedInfo
parameters.description: Get information related to campaign segmentation, schedules, variations info, and notes along with other data for all the campaigns

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: *(only for FullStack campaigns) Get all campaigns that are using a particular project

parameters.name: sdkKey
parameters.description: *(only for FullStack campaigns) Get all campaigns which are using a particular environment of a project having this sdk-key

sync.example:
<!-- Start VWO Sync SmartCode -->
<script type='text/javascript'>
var _vis_opt_account_id = 8740000;
var _vis_opt_protocol = (('https:' == document.location.protocol) ? 'https://' : 'http://');
document.write('<s' + 'cript src="' + _vis_opt_protocol +
'dev.visualwebsiteoptimizer.com/deploy/js_visitor_settings.php?v=1&a='+_vis_opt_account_id+'&url='
+encodeURIComponent(document.URL)+'&random='+Math.random()+'" type="text/javascript">' + '<\/s' + 'cript>');
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'>
if(typeof(_vis_opt_settings_loaded) == "boolean") { document.write('<s' + 'cript src="' + _vis_opt_protocol +
'd5phz18u4wuww.cloudfront.net/vis_opt.js" type="text/javascript">' + '<\/s' + 'cript>'); }
// if your site already has jQuery 1.4.2, replace vis_opt.js with vis_opt_no_jquery.js above
</script>

<script type='text/javascript'>
if(typeof(_vis_opt_settings_loaded) == "boolean" && typeof(_vis_opt_top_initialize) == "function") {
        _vis_opt_top_initialize(); vwo_$(document).ready(function() { _vis_opt_bottom_initialize(); });
}
</script>
<!-- End VWO Sync SmartCode -->
